summary: Provides stub implementations for a range of Flax-based diffusion model components—including encoders, UNet, control nets, schedulers, and pipelines—so that the library can be imported without requiring the Flax backend.
business_intent: Enable graceful degradation and compatibility in environments where Flax is unavailable by supplying placeholder objects that raise clear errors or act as no‑ops, ensuring the rest of the diffusion framework remains usable.
